attributes.action: Stop lanlords discrimination against people on housing benefits, ban "no dss"
attributes.additional_details: Stop lanlords and agencys from REFUSING to accept dss on there properties,  it's discrimination against people on benefits , its inhumane and is creating homeless people as there are very little council places left available in this country.
attributes.background: Stop lanlords and agencys from REFUSING to accept dss on there properties,  it's discrimination against people on benefits , its inhumane and is creating homeless people as there are very little council places left available in this country.
